page.title: 17HOME LIFE 3 - OWERSBY
page.content: I am an elderly woman living alone in a cottagy type house,as yet unmodern- ised.People wonder how I manage-quite well really.My livingroom has a combin -ation grate with side oven and low pressure boiler,so 1 fire bakes,heats the room and water.I also have a mob- ile gas fire & an Aladdin lamp.In the kitchen I boil,fry,stew,steam,make jam or bake girdle scones on a Valor par- affin stove.A larger than average gar- den supplies fruit,veg.and flowers. Having no electricity I don't watch TV but enjoy the radio and have several interests including the W.I. which I joined in 1926 when I was the youngest member-now I'm about the oldest.I am conveniently next door to the village shop cum post office.I rely on public transport.I don't take holidays but en -joy days out.Content with my lot I am never bored-a common word nowadays.
